description.narrative: Strengthened Delivery of Climate Resilient water and Sanitation Services and hygiene practices in schools and health care centers, which contributes to Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2024, children, adolescents and their families, especially the most vulnerable, have improved access to sustainable, equitable and safely managed water, sanitation and hygiene services including in most vulnerable communities.

participating-org.narrative: DIRECTORATE OF ERBIL SURROUNDING WA DESW

mailing-address.narrative: C/o UNICEF Amman P.O. Box 1551 Amman 11821

sector.narrative: Hygiene - handwashing with soap in communities
Sanitation - improving services in peri-urban and urban communities (except household water treatment and storage, moving up the ladder and strengthening sustainability)
Sanitation and hygiene - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) including menstrual hygiene management
WASH in emergencies - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) response including menstrual hygiene management
Water supply and sanitation - large systems

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened Delivery of Climate Resilient water and Sanitation Services and hygiene practices in schools and health care centers
Number of districts implementing Handwashing behaviour-change programmes at community level
